pages.title: Cave Bear
pages.text: Both the word "cave" and the scientific name spelaeus are used because fossils of this species were mostly found in caves.$(br2)This reflects the views of experts that cave bears may have spent more time in caves than the brown bear, which uses caves only for hibernation.
